channel.title: CVE Feed for Lynx Technik AG -- Yellowbrik
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lynx Technik AG -- Yellowbrik

item.title: CVE-2023-0750|2024-08-02T05:24:34.129Z -- lynx%20technik%20ag -- yellowbrik
item.description:
Yellobrik PEC-1864 implements authentication checks via javascript in the frontend interface.Â When the device can be accessed over the network an attacker could bypass authentication.
This would allow an attacker to : - Change the password, resulting in a DOS of the users
- Change the streaming source, compromising the integrity of the stream
- Change the streaming destination, compromising the confidentiality of the stream
This issue affects Yellowbrik: PEC 1864. No patch has been issued by the manufacturer as this model was discontinued.
